elements.title: Hasanpaşa Gasworks (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Hasanpaşa Gasworks (pictured) escaped its demolition through the resistance of local residents, became a festival venue for a time and was finally transformed into a museum after redevelopment?

elements.title: Tara Jones (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that, in 2018, Tara Jones both captained a women's Super League team and was the first female match official in the men's Super League?

elements.title: Get Together (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the limited radio airplay of "Get Together" in the US spawned a petition, outrage, and conspiracy theories among Madonna fans?

elements.title: The Bone People (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that The Bone People by Keri Hulme nearly ended up as a doorstop instead of a Booker Prize-winning novel?

elements.title: Juliet Rice Wichman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Juliet Rice Wichman once stood in front of a bulldozer to prevent the destruction of a rock wall?

elements.title: the change of South Kalimantan capital city (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the change of South Kalimantan capital city from Banjarmasin to Banjarbaru was called a "constitutional coup" by its opponents?

elements.title: Chuck Deardorf (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Chuck Deardorf joked that he "played both kinds of music: country and western"?

elements.title: mushroom synagogues (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that mushroom synagogues helped many Jews celebrate the High Holidays?
